CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.4.2, drugauthorizationcountry (2A)
E2B (R3): G.k.3.2 Country of Authorisation / Application Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.3.1 is provided. Data Type: 2A OID: 1.0.3166.1.2.2 Value Allowed: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2, EU
CustomField.label: Country of Authorization/Application
